title: Drawing, "Screen Design:  "Voodoo for Peace," Front Side", ca. 1984
medium: Black marking pen, brush and watercolor/gouache (?) on white tracing paper, with taped-on tracing paper overlay
description: Design for painted decoration on upper half of four figures of this four panel screen. Each figure is composed of colorful, decorative, geometric shapes and patterns.  Reading from left to right:  figure with red, eliptical head; figure with blue biomorphic-shaped head; figure with headdress of three orange cans with feathers; figure with orange target head.  A tracing paper overlay reverses the two central figures:  second from left figure has headdress of two red cans with feathers and third figure wears blue crown.
